edu.illinois.mitra.starl.functions

Class BarrierSynchronizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.mitra.starl.functions.BarrierSynchronizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cancellable, MessageListener, Synchronizer

    public class BarrierSynchronizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Synchronizer, MessageListener
    The BarrierSynchronizer class is used to synchronize all agents to a known point. The synchronizer will not provide "permission" to proceed past a certain point (a barrier) until all participating agents have signaled that they are at the barrier.
